Text:
Every single ID3 tag is malformed/corrupt. And each MP3 has an average of 30 pieces, severely hampering download speeds.

You shouldn't have more than maybe 4 pieces per MP3, all the micro pieces will take forever to connect to.

128kbps is really awful. Also, don't you know how to tag your mp3s?  

But hey, thanks!

Thanks very much.
With all those seeders around it down loaded in a flash.

Thanks very much.
Tags aren't too relevant - I can just 'find album info' and its all there.
The smaller pieces are great for those of us on a slow connection - hash failures waste smaller bites of data - and for those who want only selected tracks small pieces are more efficient.
Great torrent!

Note that the size is apparently 128kbps
Notice the size is small for a two album set.

debakaputite: 
i care, not everyone has a crappy audio system

you got me here - I have no audio systems at all :)  
so I prefer small files to carry around. 
But if you open ur eyes , you will see, that 35 songs in 123MB is about right for 128kbps  / 1MB per minute/
So if someone is unhappy - don't fucking download and don't complain !!!!
Thanks Ekolb ! Your torrents are great, movies and all !
